wikitext.*:
'''Middle-earth Enterprises''' (formerly '''Tolkien Enterprises''') is a company which has the world-wide adaptation and merchandising rights to ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'' and ''[[The Hobbit]]''.<ref>{{webcite|articleurl=http://www.middleearth.com/about.html|articlename=About|accessed=21 June 2014|website=[http://www.middleearth.com/about.html Middle-earth Enterpises]}}</ref>

On the website was formerly listed the '''names, characters, locations, events, and objects from Tolkien's over which Middle-earth Enterprises claimed copyright'''. Below is the list from [[2003]].<ref>{{webcite|accessed=21 June 2014|dated=2 October 2003|articleurl=http://web.archive.org/web/20031002233005/http://tolkien-ent.com/new/names.html|articlename=Tolkien Fanciful Names - Characters|website=[http://web.archive.org/web/20031001223313/http://www.tolkien-ent.com/new/index.html Tolkien Enterprises] (via [http://www.archive.org Archive.org])}}</ref><ref>{{webcite|accessed=21 June 2014|dated=2 October 2003|articleurl=http://web.archive.org/web/20031002233358/http://tolkien-ent.com/new/places.html|articlename=Tolkien Fanciful Names - Places|website=[http://web.archive.org/web/20031001223313/http://www.tolkien-ent.com/new/index.html Tolkien Enterprises] (via [http://www.archive.org Archive.org])}}</ref><ref>{{webcite|accessed=21 June 2014|dated=2 October 2003|articleurl=http://web.archive.org/web/20031002025241/http://tolkien-ent.com/new/things.html|articlename=Tolkien Fanciful Names - Things & Events|website=[http://web.archive.org/web/20031001223313/http://www.tolkien-ent.com/new/index.html Tolkien Enterprises] (via [http://www.archive.org Archive.org])}}</ref>
